meta.note: Full mapping of severity values between main and optional medicines (Low/Moderate/High).

rules.rationale: High-risk interaction: combination may lead to serious adverse events (bleeding, therapeutic failure, or significant pharmacodynamic/pharmacokinetic interaction).
rules.recommended_action: Avoid combination if possible; consult specialist and monitor closely (lab monitoring or clinical review).

rules.rationale: Moderate interaction: may require monitoring, dose adjustment, or selection of alternatives.
rules.recommended_action: Review therapy, consider alternatives or dose changes; monitor symptoms/labs as appropriate.
